content: We’ll give you 2% Cashback when you drawdown your fixed rate investment mortgage with us.
We have a range of competitive fixed and variable investor interest options. We will be happy to talk you through them.

We have an extensive nationwide branch network where you can talk to qualified experts, and a team of Mobile Mortgage Managers who are available to meet you when and where it suits you best – at home or at work, even at the weekend.
We can go through your application from end to end with you over the phone. Call us on 0818 365 345 – available Mon – Fri 9am –5pm.
You can start your mortgage application online in minutes.
Have a look at how you can flex your mortgage to suit your lifestyle with our Flexi-Options.
